Package rt.testscenes

Simple test scenes to compare your renderer to a reference solution.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Blinn
    Simple scene using a Blinn material.
    Camera
    Test scene for pinhole camera specifications.
    CSGScene  
    Instancing
    Test scene for instancing and rendering triangle meshes.
    RefractiveSphere
    Test scene for refractive objects, renders a sphere in front of a planar background.

Package rt.testscenes Description

Simple test scenes to compare your renderer to a reference solution. Output images of these scenes are in the "testscenes output" directory. These scenes cannot be rendered with the base code because they use additional classes that you are supposed to implement!
